ifeq ($(MTK_CROSSMOUNT_SUPPORT), yes)

TOP_LOCAL_PATH:= $(call my-dir)
include $(CLEAR_VARS)

include $(TOP_LOCAL_PATH)/deps/openssl/Android.mk
include $(TOP_LOCAL_PATH)/deps/http_parser/Android.mk
include $(TOP_LOCAL_PATH)/deps/zlib/Android.mk
include $(TOP_LOCAL_PATH)/deps/uv/Android.mk
include $(TOP_LOCAL_PATH)/deps/cares/Android.mk
include $(TOP_LOCAL_PATH)/deps/v8/Android.mk
include $(TOP_LOCAL_PATH)/deps/debugger-agent/Android.mk
include $(TOP_LOCAL_PATH)/src/Android.mk

LOCAL_PATH := $(TOP_LOCAL_PATH)
include $(CLEAR_VARS)

LOCAL_MODULE    := nodejs
LOCAL_PROPRIETARY_MODULE := true
LOCAL_MODULE_OWNER := mtk

LOCAL_SRC_FILES:=

include $(MTK_SHARED_LIBRARY)

endif
